currentFile.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.text.Font?>

<BorderPane prefHeight="700.0" prefWidth="1000.0" styleClass="root" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.papel.imdb_clone.gui.MainController">
   
   <!-- Top Menu Bar -->
   <top>
      <MenuBar>
         <menus>
            <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="File">
               <items>
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Import Data" />
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Export Data" />
                  <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" />
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Exit" />
               </items>
            </Menu>
            <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Edit">
               <items>
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Preferences" />
               </items>
            </Menu>
            <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Help">
               <items>
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="About" />
               </items>
            </Menu>
         </menus>
      </MenuBar>
   </top>
   
   <!-- Main Content Area -->
   <center>
      <TabPane styleClass="main-tab-pane" tabClosingPolicy="UNAVAILABLE">
         <tabs>
            
            <!-- Movies Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="ðŸŽ¬ Movies">
               <content>
                  <BorderPane>
                     <top>
                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0" />
                           </padding>
                           <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="Movie Collection">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                              <Button onAction="#showAddMovieDialog" styleClass="primary-button" text="âž• Add Movie" />
                              <Button onAction="#showRatingDialog" styleClass="secondary-button" text="â­ Rate Movie" />
                              <Button onAction="#showMovieDetails" styleClass="secondary-button" text="ðŸ“‹ View Details" />
                              <Button onAction="#addToWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button" text="ðŸ“ Add to Watchlist" />
                              <Button onAction="#deleteMovie" styleClass="danger-button" text="ðŸ—‘ï¸ Delete" />
                              <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              <Label text="Double-click a movie for details" styleClass="hint-text" />
                           </HBox>
                        </VBox>
                     </top>
                     <center>
                        <TableView fx:id="movieTable" styleClass="main-table">
                           <columnResizePolicy>
                              <TableView fx:constant="CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY" />
                           </columnResizePolicy>
                           <placeholder>
                              <Label text="No movies found. Click 'Add Movie' to get started!" styleClass="placeholder-text" />
                           </placeholder>
                        </TableView>
                     </center>
                  </BorderPane>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
            <!-- Series Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="ðŸ“º Series">
               <content>
                  <BorderPane>
                     <top>
                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0" />
                           </padding>
                           <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="TV Series Collection">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                              <Button onAction="#showAddSeriesDialog" styleClass="primary-button" text="âž• Add Series" />
                              <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              <Label text="Expand series to view seasons and episodes" styleClass="hint-text" />
                           </HBox>
                        </VBox>
                     </top>
                     <center>
                        <TreeView fx:id="seriesTree" styleClass="main-tree" />
                     </center>
                  </BorderPane>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
            <!-- Quick Add Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="âž• Quick Add">
               <content>
                  <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="30.0" styleClass="quick-add-container">
                     <padding>
                        <Insets bottom="50.0" left="50.0" right="50.0" top="50.0" />
                     </padding>
                     
                     <Label styleClass="page-title" text="Quick Add Content">
                        <font>
                           <Font name="System Bold" size="24.0" />
                        </font>
                     </Label>
                     
                     <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20.0" styleClass="quick-add-buttons">
                        <Button onAction="#showAddMovieDialog" prefWidth="250.0" styleClass="large-primary-button" text="ðŸŽ¬ Add New Movie">
                           <font>
                              <Font size="16.0" />
                           </font>
                        </Button>
                        <Button onAction="#showAddSeriesDialog" prefWidth="250.0" styleClass="large-primary-button" text="ðŸ“º Add New Series">
                           <font>
                              <Font size="16.0" />
                           </font>
                        </Button>
                     </VBox>
                     
                     <Label styleClass="hint-text" text="Quickly add new content to your collection" />
                  </VBox>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
            <!-- Watchlist Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="ðŸ“‹ Watchlists">
               <content>
                  <BorderPane>
                     <top>
                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0" />
                           </padding>
                           <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="My Watchlists">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                              <Button onAction="#createWatchlist" styleClass="primary-button" text="âž• Create Watchlist" />
                              <Button onAction="#deleteWatchlist" styleClass="danger-button" text="ðŸ—‘ï¸ Delete Watchlist" />
                              <Button onAction="#addToWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button" text="ðŸ“ Add to Watchlist" />
                              <Button onAction="#removeFromWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button" text="âž– Remove from Watchlist" />
                              <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              <Label text="Select a watchlist to view its contents" styleClass="hint-text" />
                           </HBox>
                        </VBox>
                     </top>
                     <center>
                        <SplitPane dividerPositions="0.3" orientation="HORIZONTAL">
                           <items>
                              <VBox spacing="5.0">
                                 <padding>
                                    <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="5.0" top="10.0" />
                                 </padding>
                                 <Label styleClass="section-title" text="Watchlists:">
                                    <font>
                                       <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0" />
                                    </font>
                                 </Label>
                                 <ListView fx:id="watchlistsView" styleClass="watchlist-list" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                    <placeholder>
                                       <Label styleClass="placeholder-text" text="No watchlists created yet. Click 'Create Watchlist' to get started!" />
                                    </placeholder>
                                 </ListView>
                              </VBox>
                              <VBox spacing="5.0">
                                 <padding>
                                    <Insets bottom="10.0" left="5.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" />
                                 </padding>
                                 <Label fx:id="watchlistContentTitle" styleClass="section-title" text="Watchlist Contents:">
                                    <font>
                                       <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0" />
                                    </font>
                                 </Label>
                                 <TableView fx:id="watchlistContentTable" styleClass="main-table" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                    <columnResizePolicy>
                                       <TableView fx:constant="CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY" />
                                    </columnResizePolicy>
                                    <placeholder>
                                       <Label styleClass="placeholder-text" text="Select a watchlist to view its contents" />
                                    </placeholder>
                                 </TableView>
                              </VBox>
                           </items>
                        </SplitPane>
                     </center>
                  </BorderPane>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
            <!-- Advanced Search Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="ðŸ” Search">
               <content>
                  <BorderPane>
                     <top>
                        <VBox spacing="15.0" styleClass="search-header">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="15.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="20.0" />
                           </padding>
                           
                           <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="Advanced Search">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           
                           <GridPane hgap="15.0" vgap="12.0" styleClass="search-grid">
                              <columnConstraints>
                                 <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0" />
                                 <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                                 <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0" />
                                 <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              </columnConstraints>
                              <rowConstraints>
                                 <RowConstraints />
                                 <RowConstraints />
                                 <RowConstraints />
                                 <RowConstraints />
                                 <RowConstraints />
                              </rowConstraints>
                              
                              <!-- Row 1: Basic Search -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Title:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="0" />
                              <TextField fx:id="titleField" promptText="Start typing for suggestions..." styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="0" />
                              
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Genre:" GridPane.columnIndex="2" GridPane.rowIndex="0" />
                              <ComboBox fx:id="genreCombo" promptText="Select genre..." styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="3" GridPane.rowIndex="0" />
                              
                              <!-- Row 2: People -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Actor:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="1" />
                              <TextField fx:id="actorField" promptText="Enter actor name..." styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="1" />
                              
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Director:" GridPane.columnIndex="2" GridPane.rowIndex="1" />
                              <TextField fx:id="directorField" promptText="Enter director name..." styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="3" GridPane.rowIndex="1" />
                              
                              <!-- Row 3: Ratings -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Min IMDB:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="2" />
                              <HBox spacing="5" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                 <Slider fx:id="minImdbSlider" min="0" max="10" blockIncrement="0.5" majorTickUnit="2" minorTickCount="1" showTickMarks="true" showTickLabels="true" styleClass="rating-slider" />
                                 <Label fx:id="minImdbLabel" text="0.0" styleClass="slider-value" />
                              </HBox>
                              
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Min User Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="2" GridPane.rowIndex="2" />
                              <HBox spacing="5" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="3" GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                 <Slider fx:id="minUserSlider" min="0" max="10" blockIncrement="0.5" majorTickUnit="2" minorTickCount="1" showTickMarks="true" showTickLabels="true" styleClass="rating-slider" />
                                 <Label fx:id="minUserLabel" text="0.0" styleClass="slider-value" />
                              </HBox>
                              
                              <!-- Row 4: Year Range -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Year Range:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="3" />
                              <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.columnSpan="3" GridPane.rowIndex="3">
                                 <Spinner fx:id="yearFromSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner" />
                                 <Label text="to" styleClass="range-label" />
                                 <Spinner fx:id="yearToSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner" />
                              </HBox>
                              
                              <!-- Row 5: MPAA Rating -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="MPAA Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="4" />
                              <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.columnSpan="3" GridPane.rowIndex="4">
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingG" text="G" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingPG" text="PG" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingPG13" text="PG-13" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingR" text="R" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingNC17" text="NC-17" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingNR" text="NR" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                              </HBox>
                           </GridPane>
                           
                           <!-- Search Controls -->
                           <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="15">
                              <Button onAction="#handleSearch" styleClass="primary-button" text="ðŸ” Search Movies">
                                 <font>
                                    <Font size="14.0" />
                                 </font>
                              </Button>
                              <Button onAction="#clearSearch" styleClass="secondary-button" text="ðŸ—‘ï¸ Clear" />
                              <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              
                              <Label text="Sort by:" styleClass="sort-label" />
                              <ComboBox fx:id="sortByCombo" styleClass="sort-combo" />
                              <ToggleGroup fx:id="sortOrderGroup" />
                              <ToggleButton text="â†‘" ToggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup" styleClass="sort-order-btn" userData="ASC" />
                              <ToggleButton text="â†“" ToggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup" styleClass="sort-order-btn" selected="true" userData="DESC" />
                              
                              <Label styleClass="hint-text" text="â€¢ Real-time suggestions as you type" />
                           </HBox>
                        </VBox>
                     </top>
                     
                     <center>
                        <VBox spacing="10.0">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="20.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="10.0" />
                           </padding>
                           
                           <Label styleClass="results-title" text="Search Results:">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           
                           <ListView fx:id="resultsView" styleClass="results-list" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                              <placeholder>
                                 <Label styleClass="placeholder-text" text="No search results. Use the search form above to find movies." />
                              </placeholder>
                           </ListView>
                        </VBox>
                     </center>
                  </BorderPane>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
         </tabs>
      </TabPane>
   </center>
   
   <!-- Bottom Status Bar -->
   <bottom>
      <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0" styleClass="status-bar">
         <padding>
            <Insets bottom="8.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="8.0" />
         </padding>
         <Label styleClass="status-text" text="IMDB Clone - Movie & Series Management" />
         <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
         <Label styleClass="status-text" text="Ready" />
      </HBox>
   </bottom>
   
</BorderPane>

content.text: fix:
<ToggleButton text="â†‘" ToggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup" styleClass="sort-order-btn" userData="ASC" />
Property 'ToggleGroup' is read-only

I can see the issue in your FXML. The `ToggleGroup` property should be `toggleGroup` (lowercase 't') and it should reference the toggle group using `fx:id` syntax. Let me first examine the current file to understand the context and then fix this issue.
I need to find the specific line with the ToggleButton that has the issue. Let me search for it:
Perfect! I found the issue. Let me view the specific section around lines 297-299 to see the context:
Let me check the full file to understand its structure:
It seems the file view is truncated. Let me search for the specific lines around the ToggleButton:
Now let me get more context around this line:

Perfect! Now I can see the issue clearly. The problem is that:

1. `ToggleGroup` should be `toggleGroup` (lowercase 't')
2. The reference should use `$` prefix for referencing the fx:id

Let me fix both ToggleButton elements. First, let me get a broader context to make sure I have the right surrounding code:
Now I need to find some context around these lines to make a proper edit. Let me search for some nearby elements:
Let me search for the context around the ToggleGroup definition:
Let me try to get more context by searching for elements that might be around these lines:
Let me search for some text that might be near the toggle buttons:
Let me try a different approach and search for the line before the ToggleGroup:
Let me search for the search button or something that might be after the toggle buttons:
Let me try to find the search button that might be near the toggle buttons:
Let me try a different approach and search for the closing tags that might be around the toggle buttons:

Based on the line numbers, it looks like the ToggleButtons are around line 298-299, and there's an HBox closing at line 302. Let me try to find some context by looking for elements that might be in the same HBox:
Continue. You were in the middle of request:
<ToggleButton text="â†‘" ToggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup" styleClass="sort-order-btn" userData="ASC" />
Property 'ToggleGroup' is read-only

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.text.Font?>

<BorderPane prefHeight="700.0" prefWidth="1000.0" styleClass="root" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.papel.imdb_clone.gui.MainController">
   
   <!-- Top Menu Bar -->
   <top>
      <MenuBar>
         <menus>
            <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="File">
               <items>
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Import Data" />
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Export Data" />
                  <SeparatorMenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" />
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Exit" />
               </items>
            </Menu>
            <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Edit">
               <items>
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="Preferences" />
               </items>
            </Menu>
            <Menu mnemonicParsing="false" text="Help">
               <items>
                  <MenuItem mnemonicParsing="false" text="About" />
               </items>
            </Menu>
         </menus>
      </MenuBar>
   </top>
   
   <!-- Main Content Area -->
   <center>
      <TabPane styleClass="main-tab-pane" tabClosingPolicy="UNAVAILABLE">
         <tabs>
            
            <!-- Movies Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="ðŸŽ¬ Movies">
               <content>
                  <BorderPane>
                     <top>
                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0" />
                           </padding>
                           <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="Movie Collection">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                              <Button onAction="#showAddMovieDialog" styleClass="primary-button" text="âž• Add Movie" />
                              <Button onAction="#showRatingDialog" styleClass="secondary-button" text="â­ Rate Movie" />
                              <Button onAction="#showMovieDetails" styleClass="secondary-button" text="ðŸ“‹ View Details" />
                              <Button onAction="#addToWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button" text="ðŸ“ Add to Watchlist" />
                              <Button onAction="#deleteMovie" styleClass="danger-button" text="ðŸ—‘ï¸ Delete" />
                              <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              <Label text="Double-click a movie for details" styleClass="hint-text" />
                           </HBox>
                        </VBox>
                     </top>
                     <center>
                        <TableView fx:id="movieTable" styleClass="main-table">
                           <columnResizePolicy>
                              <TableView fx:constant="CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY" />
                           </columnResizePolicy>
                           <placeholder>
                              <Label text="No movies found. Click 'Add Movie' to get started!" styleClass="placeholder-text" />
                           </placeholder>
                        </TableView>
                     </center>
                  </BorderPane>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
            <!-- Series Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="ðŸ“º Series">
               <content>
                  <BorderPane>
                     <top>
                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0" />
                           </padding>
                           <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="TV Series Collection">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                              <Button onAction="#showAddSeriesDialog" styleClass="primary-button" text="âž• Add Series" />
                              <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              <Label text="Expand series to view seasons and episodes" styleClass="hint-text" />
                           </HBox>
                        </VBox>
                     </top>
                     <center>
                        <TreeView fx:id="seriesTree" styleClass="main-tree" />
                     </center>
                  </BorderPane>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
            <!-- Quick Add Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="âž• Quick Add">
               <content>
                  <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="30.0" styleClass="quick-add-container">
                     <padding>
                        <Insets bottom="50.0" left="50.0" right="50.0" top="50.0" />
                     </padding>
                     
                     <Label styleClass="page-title" text="Quick Add Content">
                        <font>
                           <Font name="System Bold" size="24.0" />
                        </font>
                     </Label>
                     
                     <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20.0" styleClass="quick-add-buttons">
                        <Button onAction="#showAddMovieDialog" prefWidth="250.0" styleClass="large-primary-button" text="ðŸŽ¬ Add New Movie">
                           <font>
                              <Font size="16.0" />
                           </font>
                        </Button>
                        <Button onAction="#showAddSeriesDialog" prefWidth="250.0" styleClass="large-primary-button" text="ðŸ“º Add New Series">
                           <font>
                              <Font size="16.0" />
                           </font>
                        </Button>
                     </VBox>
                     
                     <Label styleClass="hint-text" text="Quickly add new content to your collection" />
                  </VBox>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
            <!-- Watchlist Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="ðŸ“‹ Watchlists">
               <content>
                  <BorderPane>
                     <top>
                        <VBox spacing="10.0" styleClass="tab-header">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="10.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="15.0" />
                           </padding>
                           <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="My Watchlists">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0">
                              <Button onAction="#createWatchlist" styleClass="primary-button" text="âž• Create Watchlist" />
                              <Button onAction="#deleteWatchlist" styleClass="danger-button" text="ðŸ—‘ï¸ Delete Watchlist" />
                              <Button onAction="#addToWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button" text="ðŸ“ Add to Watchlist" />
                              <Button onAction="#removeFromWatchlist" styleClass="secondary-button" text="âž– Remove from Watchlist" />
                              <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              <Label text="Select a watchlist to view its contents" styleClass="hint-text" />
                           </HBox>
                        </VBox>
                     </top>
                     <center>
                        <SplitPane dividerPositions="0.3" orientation="HORIZONTAL">
                           <items>
                              <VBox spacing="5.0">
                                 <padding>
                                    <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="5.0" top="10.0" />
                                 </padding>
                                 <Label styleClass="section-title" text="Watchlists:">
                                    <font>
                                       <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0" />
                                    </font>
                                 </Label>
                                 <ListView fx:id="watchlistsView" styleClass="watchlist-list" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                    <placeholder>
                                       <Label styleClass="placeholder-text" text="No watchlists created yet. Click 'Create Watchlist' to get started!" />
                                    </placeholder>
                                 </ListView>
                              </VBox>
                              <VBox spacing="5.0">
                                 <padding>
                                    <Insets bottom="10.0" left="5.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" />
                                 </padding>
                                 <Label fx:id="watchlistContentTitle" styleClass="section-title" text="Watchlist Contents:">
                                    <font>
                                       <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0" />
                                    </font>
                                 </Label>
                                 <TableView fx:id="watchlistContentTable" styleClass="main-table" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                                    <columnResizePolicy>
                                       <TableView fx:constant="CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY" />
                                    </columnResizePolicy>
                                    <placeholder>
                                       <Label styleClass="placeholder-text" text="Select a watchlist to view its contents" />
                                    </placeholder>
                                 </TableView>
                              </VBox>
                           </items>
                        </SplitPane>
                     </center>
                  </BorderPane>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
            <!-- Advanced Search Tab -->
            <Tab styleClass="main-tab" text="ðŸ” Search">
               <content>
                  <BorderPane>
                     <top>
                        <VBox spacing="15.0" styleClass="search-header">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="15.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="20.0" />
                           </padding>
                           
                           <Label styleClass="tab-title" text="Advanced Search">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           
                           <GridPane hgap="15.0" vgap="12.0" styleClass="search-grid">
                              <columnConstraints>
                                 <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0" />
                                 <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                                 <ColumnConstraints hgrow="NEVER" minWidth="120.0" />
                                 <ColumnConstraints hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              </columnConstraints>
                              <rowConstraints>
                                 <RowConstraints />
                                 <RowConstraints />
                                 <RowConstraints />
                                 <RowConstraints />
                                 <RowConstraints />
                              </rowConstraints>
                              
                              <!-- Row 1: Basic Search -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Title:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="0" />
                              <TextField fx:id="titleField" promptText="Start typing for suggestions..." styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="0" />
                              
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Genre:" GridPane.columnIndex="2" GridPane.rowIndex="0" />
                              <ComboBox fx:id="genreCombo" promptText="Select genre..." styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="3" GridPane.rowIndex="0" />
                              
                              <!-- Row 2: People -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Actor:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="1" />
                              <TextField fx:id="actorField" promptText="Enter actor name..." styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="1" />
                              
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Director:" GridPane.columnIndex="2" GridPane.rowIndex="1" />
                              <TextField fx:id="directorField" promptText="Enter director name..." styleClass="search-field" GridPane.columnIndex="3" GridPane.rowIndex="1" />
                              
                              <!-- Row 3: Ratings -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Min IMDB:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="2" />
                              <HBox spacing="5" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                 <Slider fx:id="minImdbSlider" min="0" max="10" blockIncrement="0.5" majorTickUnit="2" minorTickCount="1" showTickMarks="true" showTickLabels="true" styleClass="rating-slider" />
                                 <Label fx:id="minImdbLabel" text="0.0" styleClass="slider-value" />
                              </HBox>
                              
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Min User Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="2" GridPane.rowIndex="2" />
                              <HBox spacing="5" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="3" GridPane.rowIndex="2">
                                 <Slider fx:id="minUserSlider" min="0" max="10" blockIncrement="0.5" majorTickUnit="2" minorTickCount="1" showTickMarks="true" showTickLabels="true" styleClass="rating-slider" />
                                 <Label fx:id="minUserLabel" text="0.0" styleClass="slider-value" />
                              </HBox>
                              
                              <!-- Row 4: Year Range -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="Year Range:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="3" />
                              <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.columnSpan="3" GridPane.rowIndex="3">
                                 <Spinner fx:id="yearFromSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner" />
                                 <Label text="to" styleClass="range-label" />
                                 <Spinner fx:id="yearToSpinner" styleClass="year-spinner" />
                              </HBox>
                              
                              <!-- Row 5: MPAA Rating -->
                              <Label styleClass="search-label" text="MPAA Rating:" GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="4" />
                              <HBox spacing="10" alignment="CENTER_LEFT" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.columnSpan="3" GridPane.rowIndex="4">
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingG" text="G" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingPG" text="PG" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingPG13" text="PG-13" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingR" text="R" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingNC17" text="NC-17" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                                 <CheckBox fx:id="ratingNR" text="NR" styleClass="rating-checkbox" />
                              </HBox>
                           </GridPane>
                           
                           <!-- Search Controls -->
                           <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="15">
                              <Button onAction="#handleSearch" styleClass="primary-button" text="ðŸ” Search Movies">
                                 <font>
                                    <Font size="14.0" />
                                 </font>
                              </Button>
                              <Button onAction="#clearSearch" styleClass="secondary-button" text="ðŸ—‘ï¸ Clear" />
                              <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
                              
                              <Label text="Sort by:" styleClass="sort-label" />
                              <ComboBox fx:id="sortByCombo" styleClass="sort-combo" />
                              <ToggleGroup fx:id="sortOrderGroup" />
                              <ToggleButton text="â†‘" ToggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup" styleClass="sort-order-btn" userData="ASC" />
                              <ToggleButton text="â†“" ToggleGroup="$sortOrderGroup" styleClass="sort-order-btn" selected="true" userData="DESC" />
                              
                              <Label styleClass="hint-text" text="â€¢ Real-time suggestions as you type" />
                           </HBox>
                        </VBox>
                     </top>
                     
                     <center>
                        <VBox spacing="10.0">
                           <padding>
                              <Insets bottom="20.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="10.0" />
                           </padding>
                           
                           <Label styleClass="results-title" text="Search Results:">
                              <font>
                                 <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0" />
                              </font>
                           </Label>
                           
                           <ListView fx:id="resultsView" styleClass="results-list" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS">
                              <placeholder>
                                 <Label styleClass="placeholder-text" text="No search results. Use the search form above to find movies." />
                              </placeholder>
                           </ListView>
                        </VBox>
                     </center>
                  </BorderPane>
               </content>
            </Tab>
            
         </tabs>
      </TabPane>
   </center>
   
   <!-- Bottom Status Bar -->
   <bottom>
      <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="10.0" styleClass="status-bar">
         <padding>
            <Insets bottom="8.0" left="15.0" right="15.0" top="8.0" />
         </padding>
         <Label styleClass="status-text" text="IMDB Clone - Movie & Series Management" />
         <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" />
         <Label styleClass="status-text" text="Ready" />
      </HBox>
   </bottom>
   
</BorderPane>
